title: GAME CRASH CANT RECONNECT
body: Was just playing an unranked match. Game crashed at about 25 mins. Would refuse to reconnect. Checked my router and everything in the house internet wise was working fine including my PC. Now when i try to log in i get a message saying "the game has crashed please try reconnecting". So i click reconnect, it takes me to a black screen then it gives me a message saying the game has crashed, cant reconnect, and it returns me to the "the game has crashed please try reconnecting" again. Long story short i cant return to the main menu no matter what i do. Lol i know thats a bit hard to follow im sorry but i need help. Thanks.

replies.body: Same Here...but at first it would reconnect, now only a black screen and refuses to reconnect.

I've been placed in 30 lowest priority games because of stuff like this.
FeelsBadMan
same here riot help plz ......don't  waste mt time plz..
im having the same problem dude. it happened with the maintenance ive been stuck on it for atleast 3 hours now
